name: Planetary Lake
description:
This is my submission for the Blackthornprod game jam, Mini Planets.

The idea is that you're basically a god creating planets.

I had planned this to be a puzzle platformer, where you would eventually go into a procedurally generated world, however I've only managed the basic tutorial levels. and the art assets aren't the best.  

Either way, I think this is a cool idea I might want to work on further, when I got time.  Pretty happy I managed to get something done, even if it's a mess.

Assets I didn't make:

I didn't many any of the sounds, except the voice acting( if you can call it that),water, first person script, skybox and planet textures.
